marklogic.body: If we do sign Hollins, I wonder how it will impact the current rotation. In particular, does Hollins come in before Stiemsma? I'm thinking "no," that Hollins would be the 4th big, and that his minutes would vary a lot, Depending on match-ups. We are still going see quite a bit of MP and PP at the 4 Spot in small ball lineups.
